thread.title: PBS KIDS and PBS KIDS Producers Win 5 Kidscreen Awards
thread.title_full: PBS KIDS and PBS KIDS Producers Win 5 Kidscreen Awards | PBS About

author: pbs.org
title: PBS KIDS and PBS KIDS Producers Win 5 Kidscreen Awards
text:
Winners of the 2017 Kidscreen Awards were announced on Tuesday, February 14 during the Kidscreen Summit in Miami. The annual awards celebrate the year’s best in children’s media.
PBS KIDS received two awards for Best Channel Website (for pbskids.org ) and Best Game App (for PBS KIDS Games ). Additionally, PBS KIDS producers took home 3 awards.
PBS congratulates all PBS KIDS recipients on their 2017 Kidscreen Awards.
